thread.title: Internet livid after new Cosmo cover
thread.title_full: Internet livid after new Cosmo cover

author: Erin Powell
title: Internet livid after new Cosmo cover
text:
Previous Next 
The Kardashian Klan is polarizing. That isnâ€™t new, but Cosmopolitanâ€™ s new cover, showcasing the reality TV family, really bothers America. 
The magazine put the Kardashian and Jenner women on their 50th anniversary cover. The November issue touts getting sisters Kourtney, Kim, Khloe, Kendall and Kylie, and mom Kris, in a formal photograph, the only one in the last four years. Cosmo promises a photo spread of the women and the tale of their success story. 
Itâ€™s the cover caption thatâ€™s upsetting readers. Editors call the Kardashians and Jenners â€œAmericaâ€™s First Family." While Kim's husband Kanye West has declared heâ€™ll run for President, many readers arenâ€™t happy that the magazine compared the entertainment family to the Obamas. 
According to USA Today , Cosmo wrote in a statement, â€œWe are teasing!â€ Spokeswoman Lauren Demitry also wrote, â€œThey are a huge cultural phenomenon. What we do know is there is nothing like the cover of a magazine to provoke a national conversation." 
Still, Twitter isnâ€™t having it: May the conversation begin!
